General.Name: China Southern Power Grid Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: China Southern Power Grid Technology Co.,Ltd. provides technical services and smart equipment products for the power energy system market in China. It offers technical services, which include energy storage system technical services; testing and debugging services; and intelligent equipment, including intelligent monitoring equipment, intelligent power distribution equipment, and robots and drones. China Southern Power Grid Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
